snippet.title: Songs of Silence - Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Songs of Silence, our 4X fantasy strategy game is out now in Early Access for PC on Steam!
(With a console version coming later this year for our v.1 full release!)

We've been working on this project for four years, and it's been an adventurous journey to work with such a diverse and talented team on our approach to combine the nostalgy of strategy games we know from our childhood, with a fresh and dynamic approach. 
We dived deep into the artistic path, painting the world in a style inspired by art nouveau, reflected on our beautifully crafted maps and unit designs. We managed to create a game with a deep lore in our singleplayer campaign, a skirmish mode for the comfortable evening rounds, and a multiplayer mode to play with your friends, each customizable by unlocking fates once you complete a quest.

We're looking forward to work on our roadmap, and keep all of you updated through 
Steam (https://store.steampowered.com/app/2195410/Songs_of_Silence/) and 
Discord (https://discord.gg/p3eEBrWaCj)

Thank you all so much for your support so far, and we're looking forward to the future. Our journey has just begun - and we're excited to see which path you will take in Songs of Silence.
Get it now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2195410/Songs_of_Silence/
